text: Friends with Benefits is a 2011 comedy romantic movie directed by Will Gluck and starring Mila Kunis and Justin Timberlake. The movie was very positively welcomed from audience who praised its story, characters, humor, performances, soundtrack and emotional weight. It was also a commercial success grossing $150.4 million. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * * * Category:2010s English-language movies Category:2011 romantic comedy movies Category:2010s sex comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Will Gluck Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Friends with Benefits
